titles.title: A resolution establishing the Committee to Reduce Government Waste.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 3/7/2011--Introduced. Establishes the Senate Committee to Reduce Government Waste to: (1) research, review, and study federal programs that are underperforming or nonessential; (2) determine which ones should be modified or eliminated; and (3) recommend to the Senate action designed to modify or eliminate them, including legislation.
